FAQ / Wave 2 / Battle Cards /
View On Teletraan1.net

Vandalize

  1. If I choose Weapons and my opponent has characters with Weapons in either Utility or Armor slots, are those Weapons scrapped? [Source: WotC]
    Yes. It only matters what kind of Upgrade it is, not what slot it’s in.
  2. If I have Captain Starscream in bot mode, and I play Vandalize, and scrapping, say, two upgrades on Enemy 1 and one upgrade on Enemy 2, do I then do two damage to Enemy 1, and one damage to Enemy 2? [Source: WotC]
    Correct.
  3. How does Spare Parts interact with Vandalize? If my opponent plays Vandalize, and I have 1 bot with Spare Parts and a Grenade Launcher equipped, are both upgrades scrapped? Or does Spare Parts absorb the destroy effect targeting Grenade Launcher, even though Spare Parts is already being destroyed simultaneously by Vandalize? [Source: WotC]
    Vandalize scraps all your opponent’s weapons OR all their armors OR all their utilities. If your opponent chose to scrap weapons, Spare Parts would be scrapped instead.
    However, if a card did try to scrap Spare Parts and Grenade Launcher at the same time, Spare Parts could save your Grenade Launcher.
